tools.description: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions
tools.detailedDescription: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered coding assistant that integrates seamlessly into your IDE, leveraging OpenAI's Codex model to provide intelligent code suggestions. It understands context from your codebase and comments, offering real-time completions for entire functions, complex algorithms, and repetitive patterns. Copilot supports dozens of programming languages and frameworks, learning from billions of lines of public code to help you write better code faster.
useCases: Autocomplete entire functions from comments or function signatures
Generate unit tests and test cases for existing code
Convert code between different programming languages
Write boilerplate code for APIs, database connections, and configurations
Suggest code patterns and best practices for common tasks
Generate regular expressions and complex data transformations
Create documentation and inline code comments

tools.description: Browser-based Copilot with Spaces, Agents, and Chat for collaborative coding, automation, and AI-assisted development.
tools.detailedDescription: GitHub Copilot (Web) brings Copilot’s AI power to the browser with three key capabilities: (1) **Spaces** – shareable, self-contained projects that run in the cloud, ideal for demos, prototyping, and reproducible examples; (2) **Agents** – configurable AI assistants that can follow multi-step instructions, perform actions, and help automate workflows; and (3) **Chat** – a conversational interface grounded in your repository or project context for explanations, refactoring, and code generation. Together, these features enable teams to experiment, collaborate, and automate directly on GitHub without local setup.
useCases: Spin up a shareable prototype in a Space to demo a feature or bug fix
Create a custom Agent that runs repeatable tasks (lint, tests, doc generation)
Use Copilot Chat to explain unfamiliar code and propose refactors
Generate unit tests and benchmarks from function signatures and comments
Rapidly scaffold microservices or scripts and publish them to a Space
Automate repository housekeeping with Agents (labels, PR templates, checks)
popularPrompts: In Chat: "Explain the data flow in this repo and highlight potential bottlenecks."
In Chat: "Refactor this function for readability and add unit tests using Jest."
Agent: "Run lint + tests on this branch and open a PR with a summary of changes."
Space: "Create a minimal Flask API with one /health endpoint and deploy in this Space."
Agent: "Generate a CHANGELOG from merged PRs since v1.4 and tag a new release."

tools.description: Secure AI chat in the browser for drafting, summarization, and image generation with commercial data protection.
tools.detailedDescription: Microsoft Copilot (formerly Bing Chat Enterprise) provides enterprise-grade protections for prompts and responses in the browser. It’s ideal for quick research, summarization, rewriting, and image generation when you don’t need access to organizational content in M365. Use your Pega work account and ensure the Work/SSO toggle is enabled.
useCases: Summarize long articles, web pages, PDFs and generate bullet highlights
Draft, rewrite, and shorten emails or documents
Create images and graphics for presentations and posts
Brainstorm ideas and generate outline structures for proposals
popularPrompts: Summarize this article into 5 bullets and 3 action items
Rewrite this email for a client in a concise, friendly tone
Create a one-paragraph abstract from the attached text
Generate an image of a modern workflow diagram for a slide

tools.description: AI integrated into Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams; requires a subscription via SailPoint.
tools.detailedDescription: Microsoft 365 Copilot works inside your M365 apps and can securely leverage your emails, files, and chats across Outlook, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams. Use it for meeting summaries, document drafting, spreadsheet analysis, presentations, and more. Access requires a licensed subscription requested through SailPoint in accordance with Pega’s guidance.
useCases: Summarize meetings and generate action items in Teams
Draft Word documents and proposals from referenced files
Analyze Excel data, generate formulas, and build charts
Create PowerPoint presentations from outlines or documents
Summarize email threads and suggest replies in Outlook
popularPrompts: In Word: Draft a 2-page proposal using these references in OneDrive
In Excel: Explain this model, add a forecast, and build a chart
In Teams: Summarize the last meeting and create follow-up tasks
In PowerPoint: Turn this outline into a 6-slide deck with speaker notes

tools.description: Org-wide access to Google’s enterprise AI for research, reasoning, and content workflows via SSO.
tools.detailedDescription: Gemini Enterprise provides powerful web-based AI for deep research, content creation, and multimodal tasks. At Pega, Gemini is available with SSO and integrates with Agentspace and NotebookLM for advanced knowledge and learning scenarios.
useCases: Perform deep research and draft reports with source citations
Generate high-quality content (text, tables, images) for presentations
Explore alternatives and reasoning steps for complex questions
Create customer-ready materials leveraging enterprise context
popularPrompts: Research this topic and return a 1-page brief with sources
Draft customer-facing copy and a comparison table for these features
Outline three solution options with pros/cons and risks
Summarize findings and propose next steps for this initiative

tools.description: AI-powered notebook that builds an expert on your sources, creating summaries, FAQs, and study guides.
tools.detailedDescription: NotebookLM lets you import documents and create a grounded ‘notebook expert’ that answers questions, synthesizes content, and generates guides based on your sources.
useCases: Create study guides and FAQs from product docs or specs
Generate topic summaries grounded in uploaded sources
Ask targeted questions and get citations from your material
Derive outlines and flashcards for onboarding or enablement
popularPrompts: Build a study guide from these 5 PDFs with section summaries
Create a FAQ answering the top 20 questions from this doc set
Generate a 1-page executive summary with cited sources
Prepare onboarding flashcards from our policy documents

tools.description: Secure internal web chat (SSO) for analyzing long texts, document review, and summarization.
tools.detailedDescription: Pega’s hosted Azure OpenAI Chat gives you access to GPT‑4o within Pega’s secure environment. It’s optimized for handling large inputs (long transcripts, specs, contracts) and producing structured analyses and summaries without pulling in internet content. Use SSO to sign in.
useCases: Analyze and summarize long meeting notes and transcripts
Extract key points and decisions from multi-page documents
Generate structured outlines and executive summaries
Draft technical documentation from raw notes
popularPrompts: Read this 20-page spec and return risks, dependencies, and open questions
Summarize this transcript into decisions, owners, and deadlines
Convert these notes into a well-structured design doc
Create a comparison table of the features described in this document

tools.description: AI-powered code editor with built-in AI assistance
tools.detailedDescription: Cursor is a next-generation code editor built from the ground up with AI at its core. It combines the familiarity of VS Code with powerful AI capabilities, allowing you to chat with your codebase, make multi-file edits with natural language commands, and get intelligent suggestions that understand your entire project context. Cursor uses advanced models like GPT-4 and Claude to provide context-aware assistance that goes beyond simple autocomplete.
useCases: Chat with your entire codebase to understand complex systems
Make multi-file edits using natural language instructions
Refactor code across multiple files simultaneously
Generate new features by describing them in plain English
Debug issues by asking questions about error messages
Understand unfamiliar code with AI-powered explanations
Migrate codebases to new frameworks or patterns

tools.description: AI content creation platform for marketing and business writing
tools.detailedDescription: Jasper is an enterprise-grade AI writing assistant designed specifically for marketing teams and content creators. It offers 50+ templates for different content types, learns your brand voice to maintain consistency across all content, and integrates with your existing workflow tools. Jasper can generate long-form content, optimize for SEO, and adapt tone for different audiences, making it ideal for scaling content production while maintaining quality and brand identity.
useCases: Create high-converting ad copy for Google, Facebook, and LinkedIn campaigns
Write SEO-optimized blog posts and articles at scale
Generate engaging social media content across multiple platforms
Craft personalized email marketing campaigns and sequences
Develop product descriptions and landing page copy
Maintain consistent brand voice across all marketing materials
Repurpose existing content into different formats and channels

tools.description: Integrated AI assistant within Notion for content creation and organization
tools.detailedDescription: Notion AI is seamlessly integrated into the Notion workspace, providing AI-powered assistance exactly where you work. It can summarize long documents, generate action items from meeting notes, improve writing quality, and help organize information. Since it works directly within your existing Notion pages and databases, there's no context switching required. Notion AI understands the structure of your workspace and can help maintain consistency across your documentation, wikis, and project management systems.
useCases: Summarize lengthy meeting notes into key takeaways and action items
Generate comprehensive documentation from bullet points
Create project plans and roadmaps with AI assistance
Brainstorm ideas and expand on concepts within your workspace
Improve writing clarity and fix grammar across all pages
Translate content into multiple languages for global teams
Extract action items and create tasks from unstructured notes

tools.description: AI-powered design assistance within Figma for UI/UX design
tools.detailedDescription: Figma AI brings intelligent design assistance directly into the world's leading collaborative design platform. It helps designers work faster by generating design variations, suggesting layout improvements, automating repetitive tasks, and maintaining design system consistency. With features like AI-powered image generation, smart layout suggestions, and automated component creation, Figma AI accelerates the design process while maintaining the creative control designers need. It's particularly powerful for teams working on design systems and large-scale UI projects.
useCases: Generate multiple design variations for A/B testing
Create and maintain consistent design systems across products
Automatically generate responsive layouts for different screen sizes
Produce placeholder images and realistic mockup content
Suggest color palettes based on brand guidelines or trends
Automate repetitive design tasks like icon creation and resizing
Generate UI components from text descriptions

tools.description: AI design tools within Canva for quick graphic creation
tools.detailedDescription: Canva AI democratizes professional design by combining an intuitive drag-and-drop interface with powerful AI capabilities. It offers features like Magic Design (instant layouts from your content), text-to-image generation, background removal, and smart resize for different platforms. Perfect for non-designers and marketing teams who need to create professional-looking graphics quickly. Canva AI can generate entire design sets, suggest brand-consistent color schemes, and even write copy for your designs, making it a complete solution for visual content creation.
useCases: Create complete social media content calendars with consistent branding
Design professional presentations with AI-generated layouts
Generate marketing materials like flyers, posters, and brochures
Remove backgrounds from images instantly for product photos
Create logo variations and brand identity assets
Resize designs automatically for different social media platforms
Generate custom images from text descriptions for unique visuals

tools.description: AI-powered workflow automation connecting different apps and services
tools.detailedDescription: Zapier AI revolutionizes workflow automation by combining 6,000+ app integrations with intelligent AI capabilities. It can understand natural language descriptions of workflows and automatically build the necessary connections between your tools. With AI-powered features like smart data mapping, intelligent error handling, and automated workflow suggestions, Zapier AI makes it easy to connect your entire tech stack without writing code. It can also use AI to process data, generate content, and make decisions within your automated workflows.
useCases: Automatically sync customer data between CRM, email, and support tools
Create workflows using natural language descriptions
Process and categorize incoming emails with AI-powered routing
Generate automated reports by pulling data from multiple sources
Set up intelligent lead scoring and qualification workflows
Automate social media posting across multiple platforms with AI-generated captions
Build custom chatbots that integrate with your existing tools

tools.description: Open-source workflow automation tool with AI integration capabilities
tools.detailedDescription: n8n is a powerful open-source workflow automation platform that gives you complete control over your automations. Unlike cloud-only solutions, n8n can be self-hosted, ensuring your data stays private and secure. It features a visual node-based editor that makes complex workflows easy to understand and modify. With 400+ integrations and native support for AI services like OpenAI, Anthropic, and local LLMs, n8n is perfect for building sophisticated AI-powered automations. Its extensibility allows you to create custom nodes and integrate any API or service.
useCases: Build self-hosted automation workflows with complete data privacy
Integrate multiple AI models (OpenAI, Claude, local LLMs) in workflows
Create custom API integrations and data processing pipelines
Automate document processing with AI-powered extraction and analysis
Build intelligent chatbots that connect to your internal systems
Process and transform data between different systems and formats
Create complex conditional workflows with branching logic and error handling
